As Alan has suggested, and I agree totally, it is more about the balance 
of the design, the way it naturally sits, and feels. I am of course 
talking about perception here. The natural balance of the guard just 
looks right on the right.

And as Rich S has correctly pointed out,  there are small tagane mei are 
are on the right as well.

Cheers

Rich
